sections.heading: Duty
sections.text:
to notify Court Administrator of adoption, repeal or amendment of county

ordinance concerning criminal offense.

sections.heading: Fees
sections.text: relating to public lands deposited in county general fund.

sections.heading: Additional
sections.text:
fee for marriage license in certain counties; fund for promotion of marriage

tourism; county clerk to report projected expenditures from fund.

sections.heading: Typed
sections.text:
or printed names required on certificate; affidavit; noncompliance does not

invalidate certificate.

sections.heading: Denial
sections.text:
of request to file certificate; notice to requester; application to district

court for order to file certificate; resubmission of certificate; immunity from

liability.

sections.heading: Manner
sections.text: of filing certificates; conditional acceptance of certificate.

sections.heading: Duties
sections.text:
of county clerk concerning certificate presented for filing; when certificate

is considered filed.

sections.heading: Certificates
sections.text:
to be filed in order received; maintenance and public inspection of records of

transactions conducted in clerk�s office and fees collected.

sections.heading: Custody
sections.text:
and responsibility for certificates filed with clerk�s office; public

inspection of certificates.

sections.heading: Production
sections.text: of certified abstract of certificate in lieu of certified copy.

sections.heading: Additional
sections.text: fee for filing certificate of marriage: Accounting; use; annual report.
